name: Fission Horse in The Escape From the Condemned Stables
name_original: Fission Horse in The Escape From the Condemned Stables
description:
You are Fission Horse: A nuclear powered horse developed to prevent horse related criminal activity.

While incredibly powerful, Fission Horse is very unstable. Handle with care.

Several horsies have gone missing.

You must rescue them from the CONDEMNED STABLES

Begin Operation Un-Stable

Controls:

Arrow Keys + Space

Gamepads Supported

Made in 48 Hours for Ludum Dare 49
